Turn the web into data, today

Transform any website into a table of data or an API in minutes without even writing any code.

Common questions

How does it work?

Use our point and click interface to define the data on the page and our algorithms will create an API for you - no coding!

Get started
How much does it cost?

The import·io app is completely free - build as many data sources as you want and refresh the data as often as you like.

More on pricing plans
How can I use data?

Data you collect using our app can be used to create visualizations, inform business decisions, populate databases, power apps and much more.

How can you use data?
What if I need help?

We’re here to assist you! Contact us with any questions or feedback please don’t hesitate to get in touch.

How can we help you?

Awards that we've won

How data is changing the world

Data is feeding the hungry

Using live data from local markets and newspapers, Oxfam can start to predict when and where food shortages are likely to happen; allowing them to provide faster, more targeted aid to struggling villages in Africa.

Read more…

Data is changing education

By aggregating data from past theses and course information, Project Lever can help match university students with the best advisors to optimize faculty investment and improve the quality of research papers.

Read more…

Data is changing journalism

Collecting data from around the web can help journalists to identify newsworthy trends, break stories and engage in more accurate reporting practices.

Read more…
